title: ShareCodes Collection Schema
description: Schema definition for the shareCodes lookup collection - maps share codes to quiz IDs

quizId.description: Reference to the quiz ID associated with this share code

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the share code was created

expiresAt.description: Optional expiration timestamp for the share code

notes.documentId: The document ID is the 6-character share code itself (e.g., 'ABC123')
notes.access: Read-only for clients, write-only via Cloud Functions or server-side code
notes.purpose: Fast lookup of quiz by share code without querying the entire quizzes collection
